text: Wuh rawānā hue aur Shām ke faujiyoṅ ke pīchhe pīchhe chalne lage. Rāste meṅ har taraf kapṛe aur sāmān bikhrā paṛā thā, kyoṅki faujiyoṅ ne bhāgte bhāgte sab kuchh phaiṅk kar rāste meṅ chhoṛ diyā thā. Isrāīlī rathsawār Dariyā-e-Yardan tak pahuṅche aur phir bādshāh ke pās wāpas ā kar sab kuchh kah sunāyā.
